```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

# Gathering Data
## OWID Data (Malaysia)
```{r}
owid_url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/owid/covid-19-data/master/public/data/owid-covid-data.csv"
download.file(owid_url, "owid-covid-data.csv")
data <- read_csv("owid-covid-data.csv") |> 
  filter(iso_code == "MYS") |> select(iso_code:date, icu_patients, icu_patients_per_million, hosp_patients, hosp_patients_per_million, weekly_hosp_admissions, weekly_hosp_admissions_per_million)
```

## Plot from OWID data
```{r}
ggplot(filter(data, indicator == "Daily ICU occupancy"), aes(date, value)) + geom_line(aes(color = entity))
```
